p:
GO was prepared according to Hummers’ protocol
58 . During a run, 0.5 g of NaNO 3 was added to a 250 mL flask containing 23 mL of H 2SO 4. The mixture was subjected to 5 min ultrasonication to completely solubilize the NaNO 3. The flask was then incubated in an ice bath with mechanical agitation at 150 rpm. Once the solution temperature was down to 0–5 °C, graphite powder of 1.0 g was added into the flask, followed by a slow addition of certain amount of KMnO 4 while the reaction temperature was maintained below 10 °C. Then the flask was incubated into to an oil bath at 35 °C and vigorously stirred (250 rpm) for 30 min. 50 mL of deionized water was slowly added to the flask while the temperature of oil bath was increased to 95 °C. After 15 min incubation, the mixture was poured into 500 mL of deionized water under agitation. H 2O 2 (5 mL 30%) was added dropwise until gas evolution was finished and the suspension color changed from dark brown to yellow.
